DOC.brief_summary: This research study look 9cUAB30 healthy participant . Studying sample blood urine healthy participant may help doctor learn 9cUAB30 use body .
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . To characterize single-dose pharmacokinetics 9cUAB30 healthy volunteer . SECONDARY OBJECTIVES : I . To determine toxicity drug participant . II . To correlate pharmacokinetics toxicity drug participant . OUTLINE : Participants receive single dose oral 9cUAB30 day 1 . Blood urine sample collect baseline , periodically day 1 , day 8 pharmacokinetic study high performance liquid chromatography . After completion treatment , participant follow day 8 30 .
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteer Karnofsky performance status ( PS ) 70100 % ( ECOG PS 01 ) WBC ≥ 3,000/mm³ Platelet count ≥ 100,000mm³ Hemoglobin > 10 g/dL Bilirubin ≤ 1.4 mg/dL AST ≤ 1.5 time normal Creatinine normal Sodium 135144 mmol/L Potassium 3.24.8 mmol/L Chloride 85114 mmol/L Bicarbonate > 11 mEQ/dL Fasting triglycerides ≤ 1.5 time upper limit normal ( ULN ) Fasting cholesterol ≤ 1.5 time ULN Not pregnant nursing No nursing 30 day completion study treatment Negative pregnancy test Fertile participant must use effective contraception prior , , 1 month completion study treatment No lowdose progesterone birth control pills No concurrent uncontrolled illness include , limited , follow : Ongoing active infection Symptomatic congestive heart failure Unstable angina pectoris Cardiac arrhythmia Psychiatricillness social situation would limit compliance study requirement No history allergic reaction attribute compound similar chemical biological composition retinoids No concurrent investigational agent No concurrent lipidlowering agent No concurrent medication may interact 9cUAB30 ( e.g. , St.John 's wort , ketoconazole , vitamin A , tetracycline , oral corticosteroid ) No concurrent topical oral retinoids ( e.g. , retinol , retinal , tretinoin [ RetinA ] , isotretinoin , alitretinoin , etretinate , acitretin , tazarotene , bexarotene )
